alert.note: Alert for Webb (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 23 at 1:48PM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Webb County through 215 PM CDT... At 148 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles southwest of Gilson Groves, or 26 miles south of Carrizo Springs, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... La Esperanza Ranch Airport. This includes US Highway 83 between mile markers 668 and 676. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
